content: for my good friend and sis meranda milne of the southside sweeties acc beenleigh crochet group beenleigh bowls club thank you for enabling my yarn addiction this triangle shawl is worked from the top down it is ideal for beginners as it has a four row repeat the shawl pictured is approximately 145cm wide and 65cm long this shawl could be done in any yarn the one pictured is made using moca cotton 100% cotton 1050 yards in the colour out of this world available online at www mcpatterns etsy com you can follow me on twitter https //twitter com/lil_psychotic instagram https //www instagram com/lil_psychotic73/ pintrest https //www pinterest com au/kirstenbishop50/ facebook https //www facebook com/lilpsychoticdesigner/ https //www facebook com/groups/kirstenbishopdesigns/
